dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5037 IH: Middle Mile for Rural America Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Feenstra (for himself, Mr. Riley of New York, and Mr. Moore of Alabama) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To expand middle mile infrastructure into rural areas.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Middle Mile for Rural America Act.

section.header: Expansion of middle mile infrastructure into rural areas
section.text: Section 602(g) of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 (7 U.S.C. 950bbâ€“1(g)) is amended by striking 2018 through 2023 and inserting 2026 through 2031.
